column2: I'll mention the reasons they did deserve 4 stars.. the food and ambiance.  For hor d'oeuvres
column3: I loved the peppered duck and goat cheese terrine with apricot mustard
column4: yum! Oysters were some of the best I've had in Chicago. Steak was perfectly done
column5: with flavorful wild mushrooms. I was not crazy about the bone marrow
column6: but I'm sure it was good for being what it was.  I wanted to try it
column7: but it just tasted like chunky fat to me.
